description: This file defines the RunMessages class, which is a data container for managing messages used during an agent's execution, including system, user, and extra messages, with a method to retrieve input messages.

classes.name: RunMessages
classes.description: A data class that encapsulates various message types used in an agent run, providing a method to gather input messages.

methods.name: get_input_messages
methods.description: Returns a list of input messages for the model, including system, user, and extra messages if they are set.
